roleset.name: put out, make inconvenient for someone

role.descr: thing that is inconvenient; (about what) (if separate from arg0)

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. Comparison to 'put_out.14'.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Witnesses-1 are often worried about threats and are inconvenienced *T*-1 about appearing in court.
